snippet: Mark Buehrle threw a six-hitter and the Toronto Blue Jays scored four runs in the first inning to close their series against the Washington Nationals with a win.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Toronto Blue Jays defeat Washington Nationals, 8-0.
lead_paragraph: Mark Buehrle threw a six-hitter and the Toronto Blue Jays scored four runs in the first inning to close their series against the Washington Nationals with a win.

headline.main: Mark Buehrle Tosses Shutout as Blue Jays Rout Nationals
